mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderinfo ( id, orderName, orderDesc, orderNum, orderDate, orderAmt, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date, is_del ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel, jdbcType=TINYINT})

INSERT INTO orderdetail ( id, orderId, orderRemark, orderAmount, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date, is_del ) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderAmount}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastModifiedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
